column1: Diabetes Clinical Care and Management MSc (Online)
column3: Florence Nightingale Faculty of Nursing, Midwifery & Palliative Care
column5: Diabetes is a long-term condition affecting over 460 million adults worldwide, and its prevalence is predicted to increase to 700 million in 2045; posing further health and economic challenges
